dita.p: This is a process_as_markup instuction processing.
This is a process_embeddable_m instuction processing.
This is a process_remove_from_ instuction processing.
This is a process_no_filter instuction processing.

The vibrating grid is designed for the same purpose as the tipping grid, however the efficiency of the system increases when a vibrating grid is used. Whereas the tipping grid uses gravity alone to separate the oversized from the processable material. The vibrating grid uses vibration as well. The effect of vibration is to ensure that little or no material rests on top of the reject bars at any time
In Item 1 is the vibrating grid, 2 is the fly wheel cover and 3 is the sub frame.
